login/entercredentials: Please enter your Ubisoft credentials down below.
login/whydoyouneed: Why do you need my login data?
login/popup/paragraph1: To use this app, we require you to enter your Ubisoft credentials.
login/popup/paragraph2: The reason for this is that we can not get any data without authenticating against Ubisofts API and we will use the credentials exclusively for this reason alone.
login/popup/paragraph2link: You can inspect what we do with this data in our {codeBase}, as we're open-source.
login/popup/paragraph3: If you don't feel comfortable with this, you can {ubiAccount} and enter those credentials instead.
login/popup/paragraph4: Either way, we strongly suggest that you enable 2-Factor-Authentication for all of your accounts and to use strong and unique passwords.
